description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal attacks (also known as Directory Traversal). This vulnerability is due to the lack of proper sanitization of user-supplied input in the 'path' variable. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted request with a path that includes directory traversal sequences ('../' or '..\'). This could allow the attacker to access, read, or execute files outside of the intended directory. The vulnerability is related to CWE-22: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal').
